properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 11 at 5:41PM EST until February 15 at 5:00AM EST by NWS Jackson KY
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Jackson Kentucky has issued
a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kentucky...

The Kentucky River at Heidelberg

The National Weather Service in Jackson Kentucky has issued a

* Flood Warning for
The Kentucky River at Heidelberg.
* From this evening to late Friday night.
* At 4:45 PM Tuesday the stage was 19.4 feet.
* Flood stage is 20.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise just above the flood stage tonight and remain near
the 20 foot flood stage through Wednesday night. The river should
then rise to a crest near 20.9 feet on Thursday night or Friday
morning. The river is expected to fall below flood stage late Friday
evening or Friday night.
* At 20.0 feet...Low lying areas flood.
properties.instruction:
A Flood Warning means that flooding is occurring or is imminent.

Continue to monitor NOAA weather radio or your favorite local media
outlet for additional information. If you are in areas affected by
this forecast take necessary precautions.

The next update will be issued by 11 AM on Wednesday morning.
